title: Interesting thought process Riot...
body:
I guess the main point of this post is to address to loss of LP and progress up the ranked ladder. 

Specifically addressing when it is 100% the fault of teammates. 

More specifically, I just lost a game because 2 of my teammates quit the game before 10 mins. Top was 0/3 and rage quit, subsequently the mid then quit the game shortly after. 

I would like to know how this is an accurate reflection of my performance in ranked games going forward. 

If I'm constantly being backtracked by AFK, rage-quitting, and Inting teammates it makes it 5x more difficult to effectively progress. At the very least, it frustrates me more going into my next game. 

It makes the game become a chore instead of being what it should be. A game. 

I'm not just whinging for the sake of it, I'd honestly be interested in hearing a discussion in how your LP shouldn't be calculated off of individual performance versus just winning or losing the game.

replies.body:
I mean, that was a super generic answer. You also said a lot without actually saying anything at all. 

Winning/Losing as a team doesn't even become and option when you have 2 people on your team quit your game. I have no control over that and it's automatically a loss. 

I know I'm not going to get anything changed from this post, that's not what I'm after. I'm just genuinely curious why there wouldn't be a system in place to cancel LP loss from the players on the team that didn't rage-quit / disconnect. That way their game isn't negatively impacted by something that's out of their control? Is that something that's too abstract or too complicated to code?

The simplest answer? League is a team game. It doesn't make the most sense to have everything weighted only on yourself when the entire game is played and won/lost as a team.

With that being said, there are already multiple systems in place that allow you to set yourself apart from the crowd. This was the main reason champion mastery became a thing! That's one of the best ways to actually showcase your own skill, as well as the new honor flairs etc. At the end of the game, League remains a team game.
